Application.Apps.DAC.Hardware_Control.voltage_card¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Voltage_Card

Software Representation of one Voltage Card.
class Voltage_Card(cs_dac, cs_adc, spi, muxer)[source]¶

Software Representation of one Voltage Card. One Voltage Card provides 8 controllable Output Voltages in the Range of approx 0-38V Init all controllable Hardware Components of the Voltage Card.

Args:

cs_dac (int): CS Line of the Multiplexer Corresponding to the DAC cs_adc (int): CS Line of the Multiplexer Corresponding to the ADC spi (SpiDev spi): SPI Interface muxer (Muxer): Multiplexer for CS Selection

update_voltages(self)[source]¶
set_voltage(self, channel, voltage)[source]¶

Sets the Voltage of a given channel to a given voltage

Parameters

  • channel (int) – Channel (0-7)

  • voltage (float) – desired Voltage in Volts

Returns

The estimated set Voltage of the DAC; The measured Voltage of the ADC

Return type

Tuple of floats
